document.full_text: a wildfire believed sparked by inattentive campers blazed unchecked for an 11th day in eastern arizona on wednesday, leaving at least 600 square miles of pine forest blackened and menacing several mountain towns near the new mexico border.
document.title: arizona wildfire swallows over 600 square miles
lines_and_colors: a wildfire believed sparked by inattentive campers blazed unchecked for an 11th day in eastern arizona on wednesday, leaving at least 600 square miles of pine forest blackened and menacing several mountain towns near the new mexico border.
